effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This ability gains an edge against targets the basilisk has previously dealt poison damage to.

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: The area extends from both the basilisk's eyes, and this ability targets the first creature without cover on either side of the area.

effects.tier3: Slowed (save ends); or if M<2 restrained (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If a target is already slowed, the potency increases by 1 for that target. A target restrained this way magically begins to turn to stone, and a target who ends two consecutive turns restrained this way is petrified. A target restrained this way or a creature adjacent to them can use a main action to cut encroaching stone from the target's body, dealing 8 damage to the target that can't be reduced in any way and ending this effect.

effects.tier3: 9 poison damage; M<2 weakened and slowed (save ends)

items.name: Lash Out

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target takes 5 damage. Any target who has A<2 is also bleeding (save ends).
The area within 3 squares of the basilisk is difficult terrain for enemies.
